::Spears::

She didn't see Prebon try to come up behind her.  All she saw was her 
spears tring to go through Ramulus.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (We are no where near my base.)
> 
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon ducks as weapons fire comes out from everywhere, most of it, 
> catching him in the chest. He pulls out his sword and stabs it 
right 
> into Koj's chest so the could go into back-up plan. He kicked 
Spears 
> out of the way of the beam, letting it zoom past her by inches. Now 
> it was back-up time. He sent a message to everyone.
> 
> "Yes, open fire! Come down Slayer! Everyone else! Ignatius, Savage, 
> barage from the skies! Hammer, Blaze, Bullet! Come down and focus 
on 
> where the fire is coming from, and shoot!"
> 
> Pretty soon this forest was filled with weapons fire. Ignatius and 
> Savage were sending lasers and fireballs down to the ground. Blaze 
> Hammer and Bullet each fired in a direction that firing was coming 
> from. (Bullet was firing at proto, Hammer at Firearm and Blaze at 
> SnowCat.) This gave Prebon the opportunity to try and get away. He 
> pulled out the two cloaking devices he had saved for him and 
Spears, 
> and attempts to move closer to stick it on her and cloak them.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> Brix adn Fliq were about to join the battle, but they thought they 
> saw something. Some movement, up on a cliff. They decided to check 
it 
> out, and began scaling the cliff.
